name: The Lucky Gnomber
description:
The Lucky Gnomber is a platform adventure game make it for the GMTK GameJam 2022.

When the gnome princess is due to be queen, a mysterious warlock appears out of seemingly nowhere and kidnaps her to steals her magical powers.  When the princess disappears, the king decides to make an announcement: whoever brings her and her powers back, gets to marry his daughter and be king (or queen). Follow the journey of Pocho, an alcoholic worker gnome who is in jail, alongside a magic set of dice and (a lot) of confidence, as he tries to retrieve the princess' powers and become king.

How to Play:

Use the space bar to roll the dice and, depending on the number you get, you can build a specific number of platforms with the same key. Also use W,A,S,D to move.

Credits:

Valentin Frare - Programmer.

Axel Castelnovo - Level Desinger.

Agustina Vinciguerra - 3D Artist.

Agustin Trigatti - 3D and 2D Artist.

Mariano Trevisán - 2D UI Artist. 

Rodrigo Cubilla - Music and SFX.

All the team - Game Desing.
